description:
• Gained expertise in designing distributed systems on the AWS platform.
  • Validated skills in selecting appropriate AWS services for various use cases.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of architectural best practices.

• Acquired foundational knowledge of Microsoft Azure cloud services.
  • Demonstrated understanding of Azure pricing, SLA, and lifecycle.
  • Validated skills in core Azure services and solutions.

• Received training in Scrum principles and Agile methodologies.
  • Learned to facilitate Scrum ceremonies and foster collaborative teamwork.
  • Gained skills to lead and coach Scrum teams effectively.

• Developed proficiency in designing and building data processing systems on Google Cloud Platform.
  • Demonstrated skills in transforming, loading, and processing data for analysis.
  • Validated knowledge of machine learning and data analytics tools on GCP.

• Attained foundational cybersecurity knowledge and skills.
  • Learned to identify security threats, vulnerabilities, and risks.
  • Validated expertise in implementing and managing security solutions.

• Obtained skills in ethical hacking and penetration testing.
  • Learned to identify and fix security vulnerabilities in systems.
  • Validated knowledge of advanced hacking tools and techniques.

• Acquired fundamental knowledge of IT Service Management (ITSM).
  • Learned key concepts and processes
  • Validated understanding of best practices in IT service delivery.

• Gained expertise in developing and deploying applications on the AWS platform.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of AWS services for serverless application development.
  • Validated skills in using AWS SDKs to interact with AWS services.
